mapper.sql: a.equipmentName AS "equipmentName", a.equipmentId AS "equipmentId", a.equipmentNum AS "equipmentNum", a.equipmentSIM AS "equipmentSIM", a.equipmentFirm AS "equipmentFirm", a.remarks AS "remarks", a.status AS "status", a.createDate AS "createDate"
mapper.select:
SELECT
FROM t_equipment a ORDER BY a.createDate DESC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO t_equipment( equipmentName, equipmentId, equipmentNum, equipmentFirm, equipmentSIM, remarks, status, createDate ) VALUES ( #{equipmentName}, #{equipmentId}, #{equipmentNum}, #{equipmentFirm}, #{equipmentSIM}, #{remarks}, #{status}, #{createDate} )
mapper.update: UPDATE t_equipment SET equipmentName = #{equipmentName}, equipmentId = #{equipmentId}, equipmentFirm = #{equipmentFirm}, equipmentSIM = #{equipmentSIM}, remarks = #{remarks}, status = #{status} WHERE equipmentId = #{equipmentId}
